title: The Rumour Mill That We Started
itunes:title: The Rumour Mill That We Started
description: On today's episode of The Cigar Authority,  we will break down David Garofalo's Editorial about the 2nd most asked question in a cigar shop. With IPCPR 2015 in New Orleans we expect to hear a lot of rumors, but today we will make up some that may or may not have a chance of happening soon. All that and the usual madness know as The Cigar Authority.
